import React from 'react'; import { Button, Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardMedia, Grid } from '@material-ui/core'; import useStyles from './styles'; import { Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; const CartItem = ({ item}) => { const classes = useStyles(); return ( {item.item.title}

Price: ${item.item.price}

Total: ${(item.amount*item.item.price).toFixed(2)}

{item.amount}

 ) } export default CartItem
